mapper.select: SELECT pm.personal_daily_mission_id, m.mission_topic, pm.mission_id, pm.personal_daily_mission_completed, m.mission_type FROM user u JOIN personal_daily_mission pm ON u.user_id = pm.user_id JOIN mission m ON m.mission_id = pm.mission_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT pm.personal_monthly_mission_id, m.mission_topic, pm.mission_id, pm.personal_monthly_mission_completed, m.mission_type FROM user u JOIN personal_monthly_mission pm ON u.user_id = pm.user_id JOIN mission m ON m.mission_id = pm.mission_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} LIMIT 1;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM personal_daily_mission
